content.rendered:
TRADE LIKE A GOD.

Fastest Solana
Copy Trade Bot

Looking for the Fastest Solana Copy Trade Bot? 

OdinBot.io is the undisputed fastest Solana trading bot with trade times as low as 1 second. Easily copy trade profitable wallets using our sleek, intuitive web app.

TRADE WITH ODIN

Fastest SOL Trading Bot

1-2 seconds average trade execution time on our lowest speed settings. Trade with Odin Bot or be left holding the bag.

Free Alpha Wallets

Odin Bot provides Free Alpha Wallets daily to our community members so they can trade profitably on Solana.

Affiliate Program

Highest affiliate commission of any copy trading bot in existence. Earn up to 40% of your fellow hunters' trading fees.

COPY TRADE PUMP FUN

You can now copy trade Pump Fun tokens with Odin Bot's copy trade bot while benefiting from our low trading fees.

HOW DOES ODIN BOT WORK?

Launch Odin's Solana Trading Bot

Launch Odin's Solana Trading Bot by clicking any button on the homepage.

Fund your account

Deposit some SOL to get started.

Start Copy Trading Profitable Wallets

Pick which wallet(s) to follow and watch OdinBot magically copy trade on autopilot.

START TRADING

COPY TRADING BOT AFFILIATE PROGRAM

Odin’s copy trading bot affiliate program is very generous, offering a hefty 40% commission on all trading fees from referrals, the highest percentage of any trading bot on the market.

SOL fees accumulating on autopilot, sent directly to your wallet of choice whenever your referred friends make trades.

Sign up for an account, start sharing your link, start earning SOL.

TRADE LIKE A GOD

Trade Times As Low As 1 Second – Free Alpha Wallets – Malicious Token & Farming Protection

Claim Your glory
JOIN THE HUNT

ROADMAP

PHASE 1

Website Creation (complete)
Socials Creation (complete)
Trading Bot MVP Completion (complete)
Affiliate/Referral Module (complete)

PHASE 2

Launch Sniper Functionality (complete)
Pump Fun Token Copy Trading (complete)
Advanced Features Module (complete)
Preliminary Marketing (complete)

PHASE 3

Retail Marketing (ongoing)
More Features Development (ongoing)

PHASE 4

Public Hard Launch Marketing
Full Web App Deployment
Additional Chain Integrations
[REDACTED]

FAQ

WHY USE ODIN BOT INSTEAD OF ANOTHER SOL TRADING BOT?

Well because none of them do the exact same job as OdinBot, all other Solana copy trading bots require you to sit on your phone and confirm every transaction. Ours is literally the only sol trading bot on the market that is full auto-trading with no need to confirm every tx.

Our trading fee is 1% with a minimum trading fee of 0.001 SOL. Many other popular trade bots charge a flat fee of 10-15 SOL or up to 5% for trading fees. Not to mention using telegram bots are usually painful for UI/UX, where ours is an easy-to-use web app.

DOES ODIN BOT COPY TRADE PUMP.FUN TOKENS?

Yes! OdinBot allows users to copy trade pre-liquid Pump.Fun tokens with very fast transaction confirmations, and a dynamic slippage protection functionality on low liquidity pools to make sure you don't get rekt.

DOES ODIN BOT HAVE AN AFFILIATE PROGRAM?

Yes, sign up to use OdinBot's SOl trading bot to get your referral link. Odin pays a hefty 40% of any trading fees from referrals as affiliate commissions to hunters.
